item.title: {RS2} autotalker 1.0v - rate it! *!updated!*
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Uh… Looks ok, to me
still, you should replace
this
[scar]
wait(3000)
[/scar]
with this
[SCAR]
wait(3000+random(1000))
[/scar]

That means, it waits 3 seconds, plus 1-1000 milliseconds, to look like your a human

and, to make (a bit) easier to others, do

[scar]
Program something;
const
WaitTime = 3000 //Well, now you can edit it from here. Lazy ones, no need to read.
[/scar]

then, replace
[scar]
wait(3000)
[/scar]
that with
[scar]
wait(WaitTime+random(1000))
[/scar]

So, finally, Wait(Waittime+random(1000)), waits for given waittime, at const, + random 1-1000.

Hopely i helped.

Oh- I would rate it …umm 5, because, I don’t think it’s sucky, but it’s short, no random waitings, or anything – Remember: When dealing with runescape, ALWAYS have random waits in your script.

Read full topic

item.title: {RS2} autotalker 1.0v - rate it! *!updated!*
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Please rate this script this is my first script and im a new person on moparisthebest.
Rate it 1-5, and u highly recomend readin the stuff i put at the top and use a low lvl uneaded acount
unless you dont wanna get band.
if you dont wanna download here it is.

                  updated an ready to kick some @$$!(if messed up please download at the bottom!)

[scar]
{_______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________******
______________________________________________________________________________
_______________***_____________________/___________________
_______________________________******_________/ *
_/* ______*\ _/______
____________/* *___________*______ _/________
___***********_______*_

{ !=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=! }
{__________________________!READ AT OWN RISK!__________________________________}
{ !NOT! !responsible for any BANNED acount! }
{ FIRST SCRIPT EVER }
{ !REPORT ANY BUGS OR STUFF THAT DOESNT WORK! }
{ !make a extra line at the bottom and put the cursor there or it will mess up }
{ ±+SPECIAL THANKS TO…±+ }
{ BULLZEYE }
{ JUNIOR }
{ AND OTHERS THAT HELPED }
///////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

program autotalker;

const
message1=(‘testing’); //type what you want him/her to say
message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade’);
message3=(‘Thank you for using JunkJ"s auto talker!’);
message4=(‘press ALT+CTRL+S to stop autotalking!’);

RandomTime=1000;//Change to set random time.

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(1000+random(RandomTime))
SendKeys(message1 + Chr(13))
wait(1000)
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Writeln(message2)
Writeln(message3)
Writeln(message4)
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Junkj

Read full topic
